<a href="https://fundrise.com/acq-plus/start?utm_medium=newsletter&utm_source=morningbrew&utm_campaign=primary-20200911&utm_content=all" style="border-bottom:none!important;" target="_blank" class=""><img alt="Fundrise" style="width:100%;max-width: 186px; display: inline; vertical-align: middle;" width="186" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL2NvbXBhbnkvbG9nby8zNS8xNTkzNjM5ODY0LUZ1bmRyaXNlLWxvZ28taG9yaXpvbnRhbC1mdWxsY29sb3ItYmxhY2sucG5nIiwiYnVja2V0IjoiY29tZXQtbW9ybmluZ2JyZXciLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ=="></a>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-top:20px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning</strong>. Today, we’re pausing to reflect on two events that forever changed the world: </p>
<ol>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>It’s the 19th anniversary of the September 11 terrorist attacks, which killed nearly 3,000 Americans.  </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Exactly six months ago, on March 11, the World Health Organization declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic. More than 900,000 people around the world have died from COVID-19.</span></li>
</ol>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">To all those who’ve suffered or lost loved ones in these tragedies, we’re thinking of you and sending strength.</p>
</td>
</tr>

</th>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
BANKING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/09/10/jane-fraser-will-become-first-woman-lead-us-megabank-citi?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Bad News for the Glass Ceiling Industry
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Glass ceiling " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMzc0L2dsYXNzX2NlaWxpbmcuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The HBO series may be delayed, but Citigroup provided its own succession story yesterday. CEO Michael Corbat <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/09/10/citi-ceo-michael-corbat-to-retire-in-february-jane-fraser-to-become-first-woman-ceo-of-a-megabank.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">announced</a> he’ll retire next February after eight years, and current president and chief of the bank’s consumer arm, Jane Fraser, will slide into the CEO spot. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">It's a landmark moment for Wall Street </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Fraser will be the first female CEO of a major U.S. bank. And her resumé? Let’s just say she looks forward to high school reunions: Goldman Sachs → Harvard Business School → McKinsey → Citi. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>In fact, Corbat reportedly promoted her to the president position to keep her safe from other Wall Street recruiters. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But her career challenges reflect those faced by many women working on Wall Street, which you could call the father of all boys’ clubs. “You cannot have it all,” Fraser <a href="https://www.axios.com/citis-new-ceo-proves-women-cannot-have-it-all-bc69a92c-2d0f-455c-a8ec-3279ab97ed8b.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a> in 2012. “Many things have had to give, personally and professionally."</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Fraser’s appointment caps off a broader management refresh at Citigroup. The CFO, previous president, and two regional heads stepped down in the last couple years. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">As for Corbat? Let’s roll the tape</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">He’ll be remembered like your freshman year relationship: got you through some challenging times, but if we’re being honest, nothing spectacular. Corbat <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/citigroup-ceo-michael-corbat-to-retire-in-february-jane-fraser-named-successor-11599742205?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">nursed the bank</a> back to health after the 2008 financial crisis, but Citi’s performance has lagged a bit behind rivals. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Citi missed the boat on expanding its deposits via physical branches. Peers JPMorgan and Bank of America hopped right on that yacht and sailed into significant funding advantages. </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Shares are up 42% since Corbat took over in 2012, compared to 141% for JPMorgan during the same period. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Speaking of which...</strong>JPMorgan <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2020-09-10/citigroup-beats-jpmorgan-to-shatter-wall-street-s-glass-ceiling-with-jane-fraser?srnd=premium&sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">was expected</a> to become the first major U.S. bank to name a female CEO after positioning two female execs for current boss Jamie Dimon’s job. But Dimon doesn’t seem interested in stepping down anytime soon.</p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
ENVIRONMENT
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/09/10/wildfires-signal-coming-climate-change-financial-crisis?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Wildfires Could Signal Coming Financial Crisis <em><br></em>
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Wildfires in the west" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMzc3L3dpbGRmaXJlc19pbl90aGVfd2VzdC5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>JOSH EDELSON/AFP via Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The August Complex, a group of 30+ fires north of Sacramento, is now the <a href="https://www.axios.com/august-complex-fire-california-history-94ce6b6a-0e7a-4254-9936-41cb6501585f.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">biggest wildfire event</a> in California’s history by acres burned (at least 471,000).</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">These fires, which are burning throughout the West and have killed seven people, could be a warning sign of <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-climate-change-market-fire/how-californias-wildfires-could-spark-a-financial-crisis-idUSKBN2611TK?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">climate change-induced financial crises</a> to come, according to a report from the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">What they found: </strong>Rising costs of storms, floods, fires, and droughts could create “a systemic crisis in slow motion” in financial markets.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Take California: An estimated 25% of the state’s 12 million homes face high risk from wildfires. That has implications for mortgages, banks, home prices, and other financial assets.</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Insurers, already pulling back from fire-prone areas, could leave homeowners with uninsurable properties. Banks could limit loans to farmers after droughts lower crop yields. Falling home values on coasts and floodplains could cut cities’ tax revenues. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>Freak weather events were typically viewed by economists as localized shocks, but as climate change makes extreme weather more severe and frequent, that’s changing.</p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">College towns. As students returned to campus in late August/early September, college towns experienced a dramatic spike in cases compared to the rest of the U.S.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Why it matters: </strong>College towns must balance their <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2020/09/06/us/colleges-coronavirus-students.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">economic dependence</a> on universities with public health concerns, the NYT explains. <th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
LEGAL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/09/10/former-theranos-ceo-elizabeth-holmes-explores-mental-disease-defense?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
This’ll Take You Back to 2019 Dinner Parties
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Elizabeth Holmes" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMzc2L2VsaXphYmV0aF9ob2xtZXMuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Yichuan Cao/NurPhoto via Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yearning for a time before COVID? We can help—with an update to the Theranos saga. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">A judge's ruling Wednesday <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-theranos-holmes/ex-theranos-ceo-holmes-puts-mental-state-at-issue-to-be-examined-by-u-s-experts-idUSKBN2612Q3?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">revealed</a> that former Theranos CEO Elizabeth Holmes may incorporate evidence of “mental disease or defect” in her defense against criminal charges. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">The backstory:</strong> Do you have six hours? Theranos was once a Silicon Valley darling that wooed marquee investors with promises of revolutionizing blood testing. But those promises didn’t hold up well to criticism or journalism. In March 2018, the SEC <a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/wonk/wp/2018/03/14/theranos-chief-executive-elizabeth-holmes-charged-with-massive-fraud/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">charged</a> the company, Holmes, and former president Ramesh “Sunny” Balwani with "massive fraud."</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This filing shows that Holmes may plan to demonstrate that because of mental illness, she did not actually<em> intend</em> to do something wrong or illegal, and she’ll have to submit to an examination by government experts. Other experts say that’ll be tough to prove. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>the trial is scheduled for March 2021. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">+ Optional homework: </strong>John Carreyrou’s excellent <a href="https://bookshop.org/books/bad-blood-secrets-and-lies-in-a-silicon-valley-startup/9780525431992?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>Bad Blood</em></a> and/or HBO’s mediocre <a href="https://www.hbo.com/documentaries/the-inventor-out-for-blood-in-silicon-valley?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333"><em>The Inventor</em></a>. </p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
INTERNATIONAL
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/09/10/eu-britain-trade-negotiations-hit-road-bump?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
UK Plays Deal or No Deal
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Brexit " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMzc1L2JyZXhpdC5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Get yourself a cuppa, we’re checking in on our colourful cousins across the Atlantic. Yesterday, the European Commission threatened legal action against Britain unless it drops an internal bill that would <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/uk-britain-eu/brexit-brinkmanship-eu-orders-uk-to-scrap-plan-for-treaty-breach-uk-refuses-idUSKBN2610OY?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">breach its Brexit treaty</a>. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Britain is nearing the end of its transition year out of the EU, but after weeks of trade negotiations, PM Boris Johnson is antsy. He said both sides should move on if an agreement isn’t reached by mid-October.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">It’s not just $1 trillion in trade with the EU at stake. The UK wants to fiddle with the open border between Northern Ireland (part of the UK) and the Republic of Ireland (part of the EU), which could lead it to run afoul of the 1998 Good Friday peace deal. U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi <a href="https://www.foxnews.com/politics/pelosi-us-uk-trade-deal-brexit?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">said</a> if it does so, there’s “no chance” of a trade deal with the states.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">In coronavirus news...</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">To stem a rise in cases, the government <a href="https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-54081131?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">capped</a> social gatherings at six starting Monday, with a few exceptions. New rules apply whether groups are outdoors or inside. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Rising cases also complicate messages by officials trying to convince employees it's safe to </span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2020/09/10/business/london-offices-.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">return to work</a></span><span> in an effort to boost spending. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>Johnson <a href="https://apnews.com/4b3f6d7c666d7d182b747049acb0ef07?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">announced</a> an ambitious plan to conduct millions of tests daily by spring. But some experts think his "moonshot" is “fundamentally flawed” and based on rapid testing tech that doesn’t exist.</p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Our Brew Originals series is back with another <a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/09/10/cloud-gaming-big-tech-streaming-wars?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">longform article</a> to keep you company this weekend.</p>

Chances of Congress passing another emergency aid bill before the election are dwindling.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003e\n\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eJobs: \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003eJobless claims remain \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-economy/u-s-weekly-jobless-claims-flattening-labor-market-recovery-showing-signs-of-fatigue-idUSKBN26123R?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003estable\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e but at a very elevated level. Nearly 30 million people were on unemployment benefits last month.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003c/th\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso ]\u003e\u003c! -- --\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c!-- \u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003c!-- END MARKETS --\u003e\n\u003c!-- ARTICLE ---\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso ]\u003e\u003c! -- --\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"c6 \" style=\"margin-bottom:7px\"\u003e\n\u003c!-- \u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003cth class=\"card\" style=\"text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px\"\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding: 15px;\"\u003e\n\u003ch3 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0\"\u003e\nBANKING \n\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003ch1 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/09/10/jane-fraser-will-become-first-woman-lead-us-megabank-citi?email={{profile.email}}\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nBad News for the Glass Ceiling Industry\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"Glass ceiling \" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMzc0L2dsYXNzX2NlaWxpbmcuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eFrancis Scialabba\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe HBO series may be delayed, but Citigroup provided its own succession story yesterday. CEO Michael Corbat \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/09/10/citi-ceo-michael-corbat-to-retire-in-february-jane-fraser-to-become-first-woman-ceo-of-a-megabank.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eannounced\u003c/a\u003e he’ll retire next February after eight years, and current president and chief of the bank’s consumer arm, Jane Fraser, will slide into the CEO spot. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eIt's a landmark moment for Wall Street \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eFraser will be the first female CEO of a major U.S. bank. And her resumé? Let’s just say she looks forward to high school reunions: Goldman Sachs → Harvard Business School → McKinsey → Citi. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eIn fact, Corbat reportedly promoted her to the president position to keep her safe from other Wall Street recruiters. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut her career challenges reflect those faced by many women working on Wall Street, which you could call the father of all boys’ clubs. “You cannot have it all,” Fraser \u003ca href=\"https://www.axios.com/citis-new-ceo-proves-women-cannot-have-it-all-bc69a92c-2d0f-455c-a8ec-3279ab97ed8b.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid\u003c/a\u003e in 2012. “Many things have had to give, personally and professionally.\"\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eFraser’s appointment caps off a broader management refresh at Citigroup. The CFO, previous president, and two regional heads stepped down in the last couple years. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eAs for Corbat? Let’s roll the tape\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eHe’ll be remembered like your freshman year relationship: got you through some challenging times, but if we’re being honest, nothing spectacular. Corbat \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/citigroup-ceo-michael-corbat-to-retire-in-february-jane-fraser-named-successor-11599742205?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003enursed the bank\u003c/a\u003e back to health after the 2008 financial crisis, but Citi’s performance has lagged a bit behind rivals. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eCiti missed the boat on expanding its deposits via physical branches. Peers JPMorgan and Bank of America hopped right on that yacht and sailed into significant funding advantages. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eShares are up 42% since Corbat took over in 2012, compared to 141% for JPMorgan during the same period. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eSpeaking of which...\u003c/strong\u003eJPMorgan \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2020-09-10/citigroup-beats-jpmorgan-to-shatter-wall-street-s-glass-ceiling-with-jane-fraser?srnd=premium\u0026sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ewas expected\u003c/a\u003e to become the first major U.S. bank to name a female CEO after positioning two female execs for current boss Jamie Dimon’s job. But Dimon doesn’t seem interested in stepping down anytime soon.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe August Complex, a group of 30+ fires north of Sacramento, is now the \u003ca href=\"https://www.axios.com/august-complex-fire-california-history-94ce6b6a-0e7a-4254-9936-41cb6501585f.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebiggest wildfire event\u003c/a\u003e in California’s history by acres burned (at least 471,000).\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThese fires, which are burning throughout the West and have killed seven people, could be a warning sign of \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-climate-change-market-fire/how-californias-wildfires-could-spark-a-financial-crisis-idUSKBN2611TK?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eclimate change-induced financial crises\u003c/a\u003e to come, according to a report from the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhat they found: \u003c/strong\u003eRising costs of storms, floods, fires, and droughts could create “a systemic crisis in slow motion” in financial markets.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eTake California: An estimated 25% of the state’s 12 million homes face high risk from wildfires. That has implications for mortgages, banks, home prices, and other financial assets.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eInsurers, already pulling back from fire-prone areas, could leave homeowners with uninsurable properties. Banks could limit loans to farmers after droughts lower crop yields. Falling home values on coasts and floodplains could cut cities’ tax revenues. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eFreak weather events were typically viewed by economists as localized shocks, but as climate change makes extreme weather more severe and frequent, that’s changing.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eYearning for a time before COVID? We can help—with an update to the Theranos saga. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eA judge's ruling Wednesday \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-theranos-holmes/ex-theranos-ceo-holmes-puts-mental-state-at-issue-to-be-examined-by-u-s-experts-idUSKBN2612Q3?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erevealed\u003c/a\u003e that former Theranos CEO Elizabeth Holmes may incorporate evidence of “mental disease or defect” in her defense against criminal charges. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eThe backstory:\u003c/strong\u003e Do you have six hours? Theranos was once a Silicon Valley darling that wooed marquee investors with promises of revolutionizing blood testing. But those promises didn’t hold up well to criticism or journalism. In March 2018, the SEC \u003ca href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/wonk/wp/2018/03/14/theranos-chief-executive-elizabeth-holmes-charged-with-massive-fraud/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003echarged\u003c/a\u003e the company, Holmes, and former president Ramesh “Sunny” Balwani with \"massive fraud.\"\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThis filing shows that Holmes may plan to demonstrate that because of mental illness, she did not actually\u003cem\u003e intend\u003c/em\u003e to do something wrong or illegal, and she’ll have to submit to an examination by government experts. Other experts say that’ll be tough to prove. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003ethe trial is scheduled for March 2021. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e+ Optional homework: \u003c/strong\u003eJohn Carreyrou’s excellent \u003ca href=\"https://bookshop.org/books/bad-blood-secrets-and-lies-in-a-silicon-valley-startup/9780525431992?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eBad Blood\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e and/or HBO’s mediocre \u003ca href=\"https://www.hbo.com/documentaries/the-inventor-out-for-blood-in-silicon-valley?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e\u003cem\u003eThe Inventor\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-top: 12px;\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2020%2F09%2F10%2Fformer-theranos-ceo-elizabeth-holmes-explores-mental-disease-defense\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"text-decoration: none;\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"\" style=\"display: inline-block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMzc1L2JyZXhpdC5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eGetty Images\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eGet yourself a cuppa, we’re checking in on our colourful cousins across the Atlantic. Yesterday, the European Commission threatened legal action against Britain unless it drops an internal bill that would \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/uk-britain-eu/brexit-brinkmanship-eu-orders-uk-to-scrap-plan-for-treaty-breach-uk-refuses-idUSKBN2610OY?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebreach its Brexit treaty\u003c/a\u003e. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eBritain is nearing the end of its transition year out of the EU, but after weeks of trade negotiations, PM Boris Johnson is antsy. He said both sides should move on if an agreement isn’t reached by mid-October.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eIt’s not just $1 trillion in trade with the EU at stake. The UK wants to fiddle with the open border between Northern Ireland (part of the UK) and the Republic of Ireland (part of the EU), which could lead it to run afoul of the 1998 Good Friday peace deal. U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi \u003ca href=\"https://www.foxnews.com/politics/pelosi-us-uk-trade-deal-brexit?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esaid\u003c/a\u003e if it does so, there’s “no chance” of a trade deal with the states.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eIn coronavirus news...\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eTo stem a rise in cases, the government \u003ca href=\"https://www.bbc.com/news/uk-54081131?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecapped\u003c/a\u003e social gatherings at six starting Monday, with a few exceptions. New rules apply whether groups are outdoors or inside. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eRising cases also complicate messages by officials trying to convince employees it's safe to \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2020/09/10/business/london-offices-.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ereturn to work\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e in an effort to boost spending. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eJohnson \u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/4b3f6d7c666d7d182b747049acb0ef07?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eannounced\u003c/a\u003e an ambitious plan to conduct millions of tests daily by spring. But some experts think his \"moonshot\" is “fundamentally flawed” and based on rapid testing tech that doesn’t exist.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-top: 12px;\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2020%2F09%2F10%2Feu-britain-trade-negotiations-hit-road-bump\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"text-decoration: none;\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"\" style=\"display: inline-block;
